name: csbconstgi
params: setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0

stmt.origin: ax-mp(wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)), wcel(c0, universe))

body.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))

body.origin:
|- wi(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1)))
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

cumulated.origin:
|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffsc(s0, cv(s1))

|- wceq(csb(s0, c0, cv(s1)), cv(s1))
-| wcel(c0, universe)
-| diffss(s0, s1)

comment: The proper substitution of a class for a variable in another variable does not modify it, in inference form. (Contributed by Giovanni Mascellani, 30-May-2019.)
